msg-todo-types.Decision: The event of the decision type is used to make decisions based on specific conditions. When a condition is met, the system will execute the corresponding operation.
msg-todo-types.FetchData: The event of the fetch data type can send requests to the specified server to perform specific tasks or retrieve data through the server.
msg-todo-types.Iterate: The event of the iterate type is used to traverse a set of data and process each data item. It is usually used to handle lists or arrays.
msg-todo-types.UpdateWidget: The event of the update widget type is used to change the data of the widget, thereby dynamically changing the content presented by the widget to achieve interactive effects.
msg-todo-types.Variables: The event of the variables type is used to define a set of variables, which can be provided to subsequent events for extended applications.
